00020     // mat4 constructors

00022     template <typename T> 
00023     inline _xmat4<T>::_xmat4()
00024     {
00025         this->value[0] = _xvec4<T>(1, 0, 0, 0);
00026         this->value[1] = _xvec4<T>(0, 1, 0, 0);
00027         this->value[2] = _xvec4<T>(0, 0, 1, 0);
00028         this->value[3] = _xvec4<T>(0, 0, 0, 1);
00029     }
00030 
00031     template <typename T> 
00032     inline _xmat4<T>::_xmat4(const T f)
00033     {
00034         this->value[0] = _xvec4<T>(f, 0, 0, 0);
00035         this->value[1] = _xvec4<T>(0, f, 0, 0);
00036         this->value[2] = _xvec4<T>(0, 0, f, 0);
00037         this->value[3] = _xvec4<T>(0, 0, 0, f);
00038     }
00039 
00040     template <typename T> 
00041     inline _xmat4<T>::_xmat4
00042     (
00043         const T x0, const T y0, const T z0, const T w0,
00044         const T x1, const T y1, const T z1, const T w1,
00045         const T x2, const T y2, const T z2, const T w2,
00046         const T x3, const T y3, const T z3, const T w3
00047     )
00048     {
00049         this->value[0] = _xvec4<T>(x0, y0, z0, w0);
00050         this->value[1] = _xvec4<T>(x1, y1, z1, w1);
00051         this->value[2] = _xvec4<T>(x2, y2, z2, w2);
00052         this->value[3] = _xvec4<T>(x3, y3, z3, w3);
00053     }
00054 
00055     template <typename T> 
00056     inline _xmat4<T>::_xmat4
00057     (
00058         const _xvec4<T> & v0, 
00059         const _xvec4<T> & v1, 
00060         const _xvec4<T> & v2,
00061         const _xvec4<T> & v3
00062     )
00063     {
00064         this->value[0] = v0;
00065         this->value[1] = v1;
00066         this->value[2] = v2;
00067         this->value[3] = v3;
00068     }
00069 /*
00070     template <typename T> 
00071     inline _xmat4<T>::_xmat4(const T* a)
00072     {
00073         this->value[0] = _xvec4<T>(a[0], a[1], a[2], a[3]);
00074         this->value[1] = _xvec4<T>(a[4], a[5], a[6], a[7]);
00075         this->value[2] = _xvec4<T>(a[8], a[9], a[10], a[11]);
00076         this->value[4] = _xvec4<T>(a[12], a[13], a[14], a[15]);
00077     }
00078 */
00079     /*
00080     // GL_GTX_euler_angles
00081     template <typename T> 
00082     inline _xmat4<T>::_xmat4(const _xvec3<T> & angles)
00083     {
00084         T ch = cos(angles.x);
00085         T sh = sin(angles.x);
00086         T cp = cos(angles.y);
00087         T sp = sin(angles.y);
00088         T cb = cos(angles.z);
00089         T sb = sin(angles.z);
00090 
00091         value[0][0] = ch * cb + sh * sp * sb;
00092         value[0][1] = sb * cp;
00093         value[0][2] = -sh * cb + ch * sp * sb;
00094         value[0][3] = 0.0f;
00095         value[1][0] = -ch * sb + sh * sp * cb;
00096         value[1][1] = cb * cp;
00097         value[1][2] = sb * sh + ch * sp * cb;
00098         value[1][3] = 0.0f;
00099         value[2][0] = sh * cp;
00100         value[2][1] = -sp;
00101         value[2][2] = ch * cp;
00102         value[2][3] = 0.0f;
00103         value[3][0] = 0.0f;
00104         value[3][1] = 0.0f;
00105         value[3][2] = 0.0f;
00106         value[3][3] = 1.0f;
00107     }
00108     */
00110     // mat4 conversion
00111     /*
00112     template <typename T> 
00113     inline _xmat4<T>::_xmat4(const _xquat<T> & q)
00114     {
00115         *this = _xmat4<T>(1);
00116         this->value[0][0] = 1 - 2 * q.y * q.y - 2 * q.z * q.z;
00117         this->value[0][1] = 2 * q.x * q.y + 2 * q.w * q.z;
00118         this->value[0][2] = 2 * q.x * q.z - 2 * q.w * q.y;
00119 
00120         this->value[1][0] = 2 * q.x * q.y - 2 * q.w * q.z;
00121         this->value[1][1] = 1 - 2 * q.x * q.x - 2 * q.z * q.z;
00122         this->value[1][2] = 2 * q.y * q.z + 2 * q.w * q.x;
00123 
00124         this->value[2][0] = 2 * q.x * q.z + 2 * q.w * q.y;
00125         this->value[2][1] = 2 * q.y * q.z - 2 * q.w * q.x;
00126         this->value[2][2] = 1 - 2 * q.x * q.x - 2 * q.y * q.y;
00127     }
00128     */

00132     template <typename T> 
00133     inline _xmat4<T>& _xmat4<T>::operator= (const _xmat4<T>& m)
00134     {
00135             this->value[0] = m[0];
00136             this->value[1] = m[1];
00137         this->value[2] = m[2];
00138         this->value[3] = m[3];
00139             return *this;
00140     }

00147                     this->value[1] + m[1],

00222     template <typename T> 
00223     inline _xmat4<T> _xmat4<T>::operator* (const _xmat4<T>& m) const
00224     {
00225                 const T SrcA00 = this->value[0][0];
00226                 const T SrcA01 = this->value[0][1];
00227                 const T SrcA02 = this->value[0][2];
00228                 const T SrcA03 = this->value[0][3];
00229                 const T SrcA10 = this->value[1][0];
00230                 const T SrcA11 = this->value[1][1];
00231                 const T SrcA12 = this->value[1][2];
00232                 const T SrcA13 = this->value[1][3];
00233                 const T SrcA20 = this->value[2][0];
00234                 const T SrcA21 = this->value[2][1];
00235                 const T SrcA22 = this->value[2][2];
00236                 const T SrcA23 = this->value[2][3];
00237                 const T SrcA30 = this->value[3][0];
00238                 const T SrcA31 = this->value[3][1];
00239                 const T SrcA32 = this->value[3][2];
00240                 const T SrcA33 = this->value[3][3];
00241 
00242                 const T SrcB00 = m[0][0];
00243                 const T SrcB01 = m[0][1];
00244                 const T SrcB02 = m[0][2];
00245                 const T SrcB03 = m[0][3];
00246                 const T SrcB10 = m[1][0];
00247                 const T SrcB11 = m[1][1];
00248                 const T SrcB12 = m[1][2];
00249                 const T SrcB13 = m[1][3];
00250                 const T SrcB20 = m[2][0];
00251                 const T SrcB21 = m[2][1];
00252                 const T SrcB22 = m[2][2];
00253                 const T SrcB23 = m[2][3];
00254                 const T SrcB30 = m[3][0];
00255                 const T SrcB31 = m[3][1];
00256                 const T SrcB32 = m[3][2];
00257                 const T SrcB33 = m[3][3];
00258 
00259                 _xmat4<T> Result;
00260                 Result[0][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB00 + SrcA10 * SrcB01 + SrcA20 * SrcB02 + SrcA30 * SrcB03;
00261                 Result[0][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB00 + SrcA11 * SrcB01 + SrcA21 * SrcB02 + SrcA31 * SrcB03;
00262                 Result[0][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB00 + SrcA12 * SrcB01 + SrcA22 * SrcB02 + SrcA32 * SrcB03;
00263                 Result[0][3] = SrcA03 * SrcB00 + SrcA13 * SrcB01 + SrcA23 * SrcB02 + SrcA33 * SrcB03;
00264                 Result[1][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB10 + SrcA10 * SrcB11 + SrcA20 * SrcB12 + SrcA30 * SrcB13;
00265                 Result[1][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB10 + SrcA11 * SrcB11 + SrcA21 * SrcB12 + SrcA31 * SrcB13;
00266                 Result[1][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB10 + SrcA12 * SrcB11 + SrcA22 * SrcB12 + SrcA32 * SrcB13;
00267                 Result[1][3] = SrcA03 * SrcB10 + SrcA13 * SrcB11 + SrcA23 * SrcB12 + SrcA33 * SrcB13;
00268                 Result[2][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB20 + SrcA10 * SrcB21 + SrcA20 * SrcB22 + SrcA30 * SrcB23;
00269                 Result[2][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB20 + SrcA11 * SrcB21 + SrcA21 * SrcB22 + SrcA31 * SrcB23;
00270                 Result[2][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB20 + SrcA12 * SrcB21 + SrcA22 * SrcB22 + SrcA32 * SrcB23;
00271                 Result[2][3] = SrcA03 * SrcB20 + SrcA13 * SrcB21 + SrcA23 * SrcB22 + SrcA33 * SrcB23;
00272                 Result[3][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB30 + SrcA10 * SrcB31 + SrcA20 * SrcB32 + SrcA30 * SrcB33;
00273                 Result[3][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB30 + SrcA11 * SrcB31 + SrcA21 * SrcB32 + SrcA31 * SrcB33;
00274                 Result[3][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB30 + SrcA12 * SrcB31 + SrcA22 * SrcB32 + SrcA32 * SrcB33;
00275                 Result[3][3] = SrcA03 * SrcB30 + SrcA13 * SrcB31 + SrcA23 * SrcB32 + SrcA33 * SrcB33;
00276                 return Result;
00277     }

00279     template <typename T> 
00280     inline _xmat4<T>& _xmat4<T>::operator*= (const _xmat4<T>& m)
00281     {
00282         return (*this = *this * m);
00283     }

00285     template <typename T> 
00286     inline _xvec4<T> _xmat4<T>::operator* (const _xvec4<T>& v) const
00287     {
00288         return _xvec4<T>(
00289             this->value[0][0] * v.x + this->value[1][0] * v.y + this->value[2][0] * v.z + this->value[3][0] * v.w,
00290             this->value[0][1] * v.x + this->value[1][1] * v.y + this->value[2][1] * v.z + this->value[3][1] * v.w,
00291             this->value[0][2] * v.x + this->value[1][2] * v.y + this->value[2][2] * v.z + this->value[3][2] * v.w,
00292             this->value[0][3] * v.x + this->value[1][3] * v.y + this->value[2][3] * v.z + this->value[3][3] * v.w);
00293     }
00294 
00295     template <typename T> 
00296     inline _xmat4<T> _xmat4<T>::operator/ (const _xmat4<T>& m) const
00297     {
00298         // Calculate all mat2 determinants
00299         T SubFactor00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00300         T SubFactor01 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00301         T SubFactor02 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00302         T SubFactor03 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00303         T SubFactor04 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00304         T SubFactor05 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00305         T SubFactor06 = m[1][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[1][3];
00306         T SubFactor07 = m[1][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[1][3];
00307         T SubFactor08 = m[1][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[1][2];
00308         T SubFactor09 = m[1][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[1][3];
00309         T SubFactor10 = m[1][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[1][2];
00310         T SubFactor11 = m[1][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[1][3];
00311         T SubFactor12 = m[1][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[1][1];
00312         T SubFactor13 = m[1][2] * m[2][3] - m[2][2] * m[1][3];
00313         T SubFactor14 = m[1][1] * m[2][3] - m[2][1] * m[1][3];
00314         T SubFactor15 = m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2];
00315         T SubFactor16 = m[1][0] * m[2][3] - m[2][0] * m[1][3];
00316         T SubFactor17 = m[1][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[1][2];
00317         T SubFactor18 = m[1][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[1][1];
00318 
00319         _xmat4<T> Inverse(
00320             + (m[1][1] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor01 + m[1][3] * SubFactor02),
00321             - (m[1][0] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor04),
00322             + (m[1][0] * SubFactor01 - m[1][1] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor05),
00323             - (m[1][0] * SubFactor02 - m[1][1] * SubFactor04 + m[1][2] * SubFactor05),
00324 
00325             - (m[0][1] * SubFactor00 - m[0][2] * SubFactor01 + m[0][3] * SubFactor02),
00326             + (m[0][0] * SubFactor00 - m[0][2] * SubFactor03 + m[0][3] * SubFactor04),
00327             - (m[0][0] * SubFactor01 - m[0][1] * SubFactor03 + m[0][3] * SubFactor05),
00328             + (m[0][0] * SubFactor02 - m[0][1] * SubFactor04 + m[0][2] * SubFactor05),
00329 
00330             + (m[0][1] * SubFactor06 - m[0][2] * SubFactor07 + m[0][3] * SubFactor08),
00331             - (m[0][0] * SubFactor06 - m[0][2] * SubFactor09 + m[0][3] * SubFactor10),
00332             + (m[0][0] * SubFactor11 - m[0][1] * SubFactor09 + m[0][3] * SubFactor12),
00333             - (m[0][0] * SubFactor08 - m[0][1] * SubFactor10 + m[0][2] * SubFactor12),
00334 
00335             - (m[0][1] * SubFactor13 - m[0][2] * SubFactor14 + m[0][3] * SubFactor15),
00336             + (m[0][0] * SubFactor13 - m[0][2] * SubFactor16 + m[0][3] * SubFactor17),
00337             - (m[0][0] * SubFactor14 - m[0][1] * SubFactor16 + m[0][3] * SubFactor18),
00338             + (m[0][0] * SubFactor15 - m[0][1] * SubFactor17 + m[0][2] * SubFactor18));
00339 
00340         T Determinant = m[0][0] * Inverse[0][0] 
00341                       + m[0][1] * Inverse[1][0] 
00342                       + m[0][2] * Inverse[2][0] 
00343                       + m[0][3] * Inverse[3][0];
00344 
00345         Inverse /= Determinant;
00346         
00347         return m * Inverse;
00348     }

00352     {
00353         return (*this = *this / m);
